page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MY DAD
page.content: {My dad gets up at 6:30a.m.,he has {breakfast,then leaves for work at {7a.m. and starts at 7:30a.m.He checks {his lorry and takes it to the {workhouse for loading.After loading up {he collects the paperwork and sets off {to deliver his load.The load is a {multidrop which means that there is {more than one delivery,it can be 40 {deliveries,all to different {destinations.As well as driving,my dad {has to check all the paperwork and {ensure the customer receives his/her {correct order.In the dashboard there {is a}Tachograph{which measures how {long and how far the driver has {driven.At about 12:30 he stops at a {transport cafe for lunch and diesel. {After completing his deliveries he {returns to the depot,hands in his {paperwork and goes home. { }
